Message 1561 of 4024
I hope that not responding to any attempts at trying to mend our utterly broken system is what you think is best. Just ignore it and it will improve,
right? Your way since this all began has been a smashing success. Shop for opinions that align with your primary objective. Choose the ones you like,
disregard the ones you don’t.

I accept your apology

through
Make sense?
